member.name: M:JetBrains.Profiler.Util.IO.StreamUtil.Copy(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Int64,JetBrains.Application.Progress.IProgressIndicator)
member.summary: Special instance of Copy method which cab break [potentially] long operation when external indicator gives a clue for that.

members.member: Note: Path with full access for all users on the computer!
